# Setup

## Class metadata

```{r metadata}
# Bounds
date_start <- ymd("2025-01-21") # First day of class
date_end <- ymd("2025-04-30")   # Last day of class

# Class days
# Sunday==1, Monday==2, Tuesday==3, Wednesday==4, Thursday==5, Friday==6, Saturday==7
wday_class <- c(2, 5)

# Holidays
df_holidays <- tribble(
  ~date, ~comment,
  # ymd("2023-02-17"), "Winter break",
  ymd("2023-02-17"), "President's day",
  ymd("2023-03-17"), "Spring break",
  ymd("2023-03-18"), "Spring break",
  ymd("2023-03-19"), "Spring break",
  ymd("2023-03-20"), "Spring break",
  ymd("2023-03-21"), "Spring break",
  ymd("2023-04-21"), "Patriots' day",
)

# Extra days added by the registrar
# df_extras # NOT IMPLEMENTED YET
df_extras <- tribble(
  ~date, ~comment,
  ymd("2023-02-19"), "Olin Monday",
  ymd("2023-04-22"), "Olin Monday",
)

```


# Assign

## Instructional days

```{r}
df_instructional <- 
  tibble(date = seq(date_start, date_end, by = "days")) %>% 
  ## Remove invalid days
  filter(
    # No weekends
    !(wday(date) %in% c(1, 7)) # Sat., Sun.
  ) %>% 
  # No holidays
  anti_join(df_holidays) %>% 
  # Assign `day` number
  rowid_to_column(var = "day") %>% 
  mutate(day = day - 1) %>% 
  ## Assign exercises
  left_join(df_schedule)

## Write to file
df_instructional %>% 
  filter(!is.na(name)) %>% 
  select(date, exercise = name) %>% 
  write_csv(filename_exercises)
```

## Class days

Used to assign challenge due dates, based on exercise dependencies

```{r}
df_challenges <- 
  df_instructional %>% 
  # Collapse exercises
  distinct(day, date, challenge) %>% 
  # Take valid class days only
  filter(
    (wday(date) %in% wday_class) | (date %in% df_extras$date)
  ) %>% 
  # Compute class days
  rowid_to_column(var = "day_class") %>% 
  # Lag to ensure exercise completion
  mutate(challenge = lag(challenge)) %>% 
  # Latest possible due-date given constraints
  group_by(challenge) %>% 
  filter(day == max(day)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  
  filter(!is.na(challenge))

## Write to file
df_challenges %>% 
  select(date, challenge) %>% 
  write_csv(filename_challenges)

df_challenges 
```
